# Plotter.Size method

Sets the plot area size

```csharp
public Plotter Size(int width, int height)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| width | Width. Must be at least 1 |
| height | Height. Must be at least 1 |

## Return Value

the current instance

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentException | When width or height is smaller than 1 |
